content: Redfoo, who is a member of the music group LMFAO, did indeed remix "Werewolves of London." His version is called "New Thang" and was released in 2014. It features a sample of the distinctive "ahh-ooo" howling chorus from "Werewolves of London" and combines it with Redfoo's own lyrics and production. The resulting song is an upbeat dance track with a catchy melody and a party vibe.
